Posts.EditableText:
I doubt many of you guys noticed this had stopped working anyway, but the "Play Online" feature is now working again at textadventures.co.uk.

It went offline for a bit while I moved house, and then it was back for a short period before the power supply failed. It's fixed, for the time being at least...

Posts.EditableText: I noticed! None of the play online stuff worked so I had to download all the games I was going to test and review.... Glad it's up again. How did the move go?
